titleStmt.title: The Rumps last vvill & testament which the executors herein named (being out of hopes of the monster's recovery) have thought good to publish and exhibite.
titleStmt.author: S. P.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 14 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
